testcase.classname: Test Search functionality and home page of ebay site
testcase.name: Test launch of application and home page
testcase.system-out: Given I have launched browser...............................................passed When I am on ebay home page.................................................passed Then user should be able to see ebay home page..............................passed

testcase.classname: Test Search functionality and home page of ebay site
testcase.name: Test search functionality add and remove item to cart
testcase.system-out: Given I am on ebay home page................................................passed When I search for "Books"...................................................passed Then I can see search results for "Books"...................................passed Then I select the "BORN IN 1939" in the search results......................passed Then I add item to the cart.................................................passed Then I remove item from the cart............................................passed And verify the item status..................................................passed
